title: Women One Shoulder 1920s Plus Size Formal Dress Tassels Sleeve Sequins Gatsby Maxi Evening Gown
description: The maxi dress is so feminine and fresh with a distinctive cutout to the front,design with hollow out one shoulder and tassles sleeve.

Sequins all over the dress, perfect for those who favor clean lines and simple elegance. Plus size glitter one shoulder sequin evening dress, Floor-length with shimmering sequins create a show-stopping look.

The long dress drapes over the hips and a mermaid skirt that flares gently from the knees. One shoulder curvy dresses, wedding guest dresses, bridesmaid dresses, sexy evening dresses, mother of the groom dresses, prom dresses, ball gowns, mother of the bride dress, banquet dress, cocktail dresses.
US sizes for you to choose from: XS(US 2),S(US 4), M(US 6), L(US 8),XL(US 10),2XL(US 12),3XL(US 14).Model detail:size M; hight:5'7 ; bust:34.3'' ; waist:26'' ; hip:34.6''.
Fit for coctail party dress,evening gown,prom costumes,Bridal gown wedding,night out,formal dress.
